alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Fayette; Greene; Macoupin; Montgomery; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 25 at 5:48AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of Illinois, including the following areas, Adams IL, Brown IL, Fayette IL, Greene IL, Macoupin IL, Montgomery IL and Pike IL. Portions of northeast Missouri, including the following areas, Knox MO, Lewis MO, Marion MO, Monroe MO, Pike MO, Ralls MO and Shelby MO. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening through 9 AM Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Thunderstorms producing heavy rainfall late this evening through Tuesday morning may train over sections of northeast Missouri into west-central and south-central Illinois.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Brown; Fayette; Greene; Macoupin; Montgomery; Pike
